name: Disconnected (danielslaterr)
description:
All Emotions Have Been Lost! Travel Through Different Realms of Existence Collecting Emotional Memory. Each Emotion Restored Will Gain The Player a New Powerup!

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space Bar

Game made using Unreal Engine 5. Interfaces Designed used Procreate. 3D models created using 3ds Max and Blender.
